conbody.p: The Symbian platform provides the following browser APIs:

li.p: This API allows you to develop browser plug-ins for the Symbian platform.
This API allows you to embed the Symbian platform browser within an application.

conbody.p: The following Symbian platform APIs are also related to browsing:

section.title: Additional information
section.p: For general information on browsing options and access to browsing documentation and tools, see the Browsing page.
For further documentation on browsing, see the Browsing documentation page.
Forum Nokia also provides documentation on using browsing features in applications written in Symbian C++.
For information on formats and codecs supported by the Symbian platform, see the feature tables on Forum Nokia: audio codecs and video codecs.
